parameters.text:
=Generate an email based on the following template, and replace the variables {INDUSTRY}, {STAGE} and {MOTIVATION} using the information that the user filled in the form. Make sure to NOT directly copy paste the form information into the email body, but to fill the variables using words that match the email context following the conversational flow in a smooth way. Also use some of the jargon of the industry they mentioned in the paragraph of the {INDUSTRY} variable without adding too much extra text. Do not add extra flattery nor exaggerations. Do not add references to external characters or people they might not know. Instead of saying “Software/tech” say “software and tech”. Do not talk about migrating yet, as they are mostly looking for this investment as a plan B. Only generate the body of the text, not the subject. Keep the HTML tags I added as this will be sent via an email tool. —FORM INFORMATION— Name: {{ $json.question_OGg1W8 }} Why do you want to get your European Plan B? {{ $json.question_MRgJpM }} What’s your industry? {{ $json.question_JzgJvo }} What’s your current stage? {{ $json.question_gGp76O }} —EMAIL TEMPLATE— Dear {FIRST_NAME},

You are now part of a select group of Californian investors and business owners in {INDUSTRY} who are securing their future beyond borders.

I saw you shared that your main goal is {MOTIVATION}, and that is something we hear often from people who decide to take this step.

From now on my team will craft your Golden Visa Insights based on the specific interests you shared with us.

In the meantime, since you are currently {STAGE}, I would like us to have a call to know more about your situation and answer any questions you may have.

Does next week work for you in the morning?

Please remember that we can only accept five new families each month. To make sure we give priority attention to your case, please let me know your time availability as soon as you receive this message.

You can also access my calendar and schedule a time that works best for you.

Here is my calendar.

Looking forward to talk,
Carlos Varela
Biz Group — Private Investments Director

parameters.subject: =Welcome Aboard, {{ $('Tally Response Trigger').item.json.question_OGg1W8.split(' ')[0] }} — Golden Visa Minute Next Step
